::Koj::
Filling Lilly in on whats going on. As Koj looks at the Inferno heading at 
the shields. Koj throws the lance at the Inferno. The Lance spinning 
Absorbing as much of the fire as it can.

::Inu::
Open his mouth and breaths a cone of Ice taking out the rest of the fire.

::Lilly::
"You two have improved you working as a team." Draws her Sword and port on 
her Arm opens.

::?1::
"Defenses stand down Claws Out Cats This is your Last Warning Leave or be 
destroyed" Drawing his sword.

::?2::
Gets her Ice gun ready

::?3::
Starts power up electricity running Up and down him."I'm ready"

::?4::
Taking her Scimitar and pulse rifle. As her Shoulder Claws snap

::?5::
A long trianglur blade extends from his wrist and he gather some plasma 
enegry." I think a Z strike "

::?6::
Gets some feathers Ready.

::Inu::
Enters Neo mode drawing his Pulse Rifle and Opens his Lancer ports.

::Koj::
Right hand Splits.
